name: DROPSOL
description:
Dropped into a dark and endless alley filled with random obstacles and special items, Jim must use his only tool, a parasol that reduces his speed, to reach deeper and deeper - and, of course, to achieve a big score! DROPSOL is a small but fun retro-style casual arcade game that will challenge you to get the biggest score you can!

> Main features:
- Retro-style graphics;
- Parasol that reduces your speed (but with limit durability!);
- Powerups - more parasol durability or invincibility (breaks the steel beams);
- Items that increases your speed and take points from your score;
- Arcade/Score Attack;
- Hi-Score automatic saving;
- Score leaderboard.
